description.p:
Keepassx let you to create a secure password and store this password in a secure encrypted database with many features like:
Create a single database for all your passwords
Keep your username and password store in a single file
Copy your username or password to clipboard and delete it after using it
Encrypted and password protected database
With keepassx you will never forget a URL, username or password again and you can use the same database across many operating systems like Mac OS on Windows
